metadata.title: Mary Frances Toast of the Town Crossbody Clutch Handbag, Ivory
features: RAISE A GLASS - Cheers to your new favorite handbag! Featuring a pair of champagne glasses in all their shimmering glory, this bag is the perfect party companion. Go hands free with a crossbody chain strap or remove to carry as a clutch.
VERSATILE - This beaded handbag with hand-laid beads can be used to carry all your essentials with a playful sense of style.
ZIPPER SECURITY - Along with an inside pocket for easy access, this product has a zipper closure to keep your wallet, cell phone, and keys safer than ever.
HANDMADE DESIGN - Mary Frances works with long-term partners, who thoughtfully hand-craft every item for a product you can love to wear and be proud to own.

MADE BY MARY FRANCES - From artistic roots in the Bay Area to the covers of magazines, Mary Frances has made fashion her passion. Internationally scaled and globally lauded, Mary Frances has become the face of artisanship, class, and style.
description: Cheers to your new favorite handbag! Featuring a pair of champagne glasses in all their shimmering glory, this bag is the perfect party companion. Go hands free with a crossbody chain strap or remove to carry as a clutch. This beaded handbag with hand-laid beads can be used to carry all your essentials with a graceful sense of style. Along with an inside pocket for easy access, this product has a zipper closure to keep your wallet, cell phone, keys, and safer than ever. Mary Frances works with long-term partners, who thoughtfully hand-craft every item for a product you can love to wear and be proud to own. From artistic roots in the Bay Area to the covers of magazines, Mary Frances has made fashion her passion. Internationally scaled and globally lauded, Mary Frances has become the face of artisanship, class, and style.
